# uninstall the widget from our jupyter notebook before re-building and re-installing
jupyter nbextension uninstall --py --sys-prefix [simple_widget]
#delete static folder that gets generated by setup.pu build step
rm -rf [simple_widget]/static/
#python setup.py build
#pip install -e .
#reinstall the widget and enable if for our jupyter notebook
jupyter nbextension install --py --symlink --sys-prefix *
jupyter nbextension enable --py --sys-prefix *

# run the notebook
jupyter notebook
